full_summary:
### Request for French Audio Transcription Service #### Title French Audio Transcription Service for Immigration and Refugee Board (IRB) Recordings #### Reference Information * **Reference ID:** WS3707962955 * **Amendment:** 1 * **Solicitation ID:** WS3707962955 * **Publication Date:** January 6, 2023 * **Tender Closing Date:** January 30, 2023, 2:00 PM EST #### Service Details The Immigration and Refugee Board (IRB) requires French audio transcription services for its recordings. The service provider will be responsible for transcribing audio files into French text format. #### Tendering Method This tender is issued pursuant to a request for proposal (RFP), using a competitive-selective tendering method. The selection criteria will rely on various factors, which will be specified in the tender document. #### Contracting Entity and Bidder Instructions The contracting entity for this tender is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Immigration and Refugee Board (IRB). Interested bidders are invited to submit their bids through the Ariba Discovery portal. #### Important Deadlines * **Bid Submission Deadline:** January 30, 2023, 2:00 PM EST * **Bid Evaluation and Selection Criteria:** + Bidders must submit all required supporting documentation and bid submission by the specified deadline. + Late bids will be declared non-responsive. + The selection criteria will be announced separately. #### Key Contacts For any inquiry or request for clarification on this tender, please contact: * **Constantinos Tountas, SPAC/PSPC** + Email: constantinos.tountas@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca + Phone: Not Available #### Additional Resources For further information on this tender, please refer to the Ariba Discovery portal by visiting: * **Notice URL:** http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14962525?extsite=MTQ5NjI1MjVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg== Updated with the below items
- **Modified Closing Time** - All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted no later than January 30, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST.
- * * Bid submissions received after 2:00 PM EST will be declared non-compliant.
